name: Squeaky Rafts
description:
Game entry for MoonJam 2022: Part 2.

Play as the colonizer or the natives.

Use their help however necessary to return to your home.

Colonizer instructions:

Right mouse + left click: Shoot (only natives).

Q: Open the map.

E: Punch/interact (rocks/trees/paddles/harpoons (only sharks)/eat).

F: Pickup/drop/throw (rocks/wood/natives).

T: Voice chat push to talk.

Native instructions:

E: Punch/interact (rocks/trees/paddles/harpoons (only sharks)/eat).

F: Pickup/drop (rocks/wood).

T: Voice chat push to talk.

The main player should download and run the colonizer version of the game. The rest of the extra players should download and run the native version of the game.
